communities.name: Diablo IV Legion
communities.description: A large and active community focused on everything from gameplay strategies to the latest news. Members often organize in-game events and competitive play.

communities.name: Clan of the Dark Horse
communities.description: Offering a tight-knit group experience, this clan specializes in end-game content and helping players gear up for the toughest challenges in Diablo IV.

communities.name: Sanctuary Scholars
communities.description: Dedicated to the deep lore of the Diablo universe, this is a perfect hub for players who love to explore the story aspect of the game in great detail.

communities.name: Diablo IV Trades
communities.description: A community centered around the trading of items and resources in Diablo IV. Members can find discussions on fair trading practices and current market values.

communities.name: The Eternal Watch
communities.description: This community prides itself on sharing gameplay tips, guides, and walkthroughs for Diablo IV. It's a resource-rich environment for both new and veteran players.
